I should make sure I didn't misread any styles. Double-checking each row:

- Rows 1-4: All correctly identified as "steel sit down".

Therefore, the claim is accurate.

- Each of the five rows has a 'style' column, so I'll list row indices from 0 to 4 under "column_name": "style".
